input_text:
Job Title: Brand Ambassador

Location: Omaha, NE

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Job Description:Feeling restricted in your current position with no room for advancement? Want to enter an organization but have no idea where to begin? Want a chance to escape the typical office setting environment and be in the outdoors? If you answered yes, look no further. We are hiring a Brand Ambassador to join our rapidly growing team!In this role, you will increase brand awareness and help homeowners in signing up for internet service with a few clicks on their phones. You will cultivate relationships, promote our service outside of conventional marketing methods, and serve as the voice of our brand. We are looking for individuals with a passion for winning and forming lasting relationships with our current and future clients. Come apply with us today if you are searching for the next career step.What You’ll Be Doing:Responsible for door-to-door knocking and canvassing assigned territoryProactively communicate w/ customers to have them sign on with us for internet servicesIdentify customer needs and become their favorite vendor to do business withAggressively and proactively provide the highest level of customer servicePerform all work duties as deemed by managementWho You Are:Positive, winning attitude, strong work ethic and teamworkYou have a track record for having good punctualityYou have excellent verbal and written communication skillsSelf-starter and driven to winYou have the ability to work independently under little to no supervisionYou have the ability to multi-task and work on numerous projects at onceYou enjoy going above and beyond to ensure customers are taken care ofExceptional time management and organization skillsStrong interpersonal, negotiation, and oral presentation skillsJob Requirements:High school diploma or GEDMust have valid driver’s license with clean DMVReliable transportation is a requirementMust have two years of experience working in customer serviceMinimum of two years of experience working in telecommunicationsMinimum of two years of experience working in salesBasic knowledge of Microsoft Office (Outlook, Word, Excel)What’s in it for you?We truly value our employees and put their well-being first! Here we provide the following:Collegial environment of talented professionalsGrowing and well-funded companyMedical and Dental PlanVision PlanPTO401(K) with company match

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Brand Ambassador
output_json.summary: Join our rapidly growing team as a Brand Ambassador to increase brand awareness and help homeowners sign up for internet service.
soft_skills: excellent verbal and written communication skills
job_responsibilities: door-to-door knocking and canvassing assigned territory
performing work duties as deemed by management

other.content: High school diploma or GED, valid driver’s license with clean DMV, reliable transportation is a requirement, minimum of two years of experience working in customer service, minimum of two years of experience working in telecommunications, minimum of two years of experience working in sales, basic knowledge of Microsoft Office (Outlook, Word, Excel)
